name: Lat Pull Down (Straight Back)
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at a lat pulldown machine with your knees securely under the knee pad and your feet flat on the floor.
2. Grip the bar with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
3. Lean back and stretch your arms, squeezing your lats at the top of the movement.
4. Pull the bar towards your chest, maintaining control throughout the movement, until you feel a maximum contraction in your lats and upper back muscles.
5. Pause briefly at the peak of the contraction before slowly releasing the bar back to its starting position at the top of the machine.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, ensuring that your core is engaged and your body remains stable throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Lat pull-downs are a back exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles, performed on a specialized machine with an overhand grip.
